items.title: Web Development Bootcamp
items.description: Completed full-stack web development course with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

items.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
items.description: Learned user interface and user experience design principles and prototyping.

items.title: Online Tutor Booking System
items.description: Java-based web platform for finding and booking home tutors.

items.title: Home Tutor Search & Booking System
items.description: A web-based academic group project developed to help students and parents search, compare, and book home tutors. The system includes tutor profiles, subject-based search, and booking management with a user-friendly interface.
